White_Plains.Ardsley-on-Hudson (Metro-North station): The Ardsley-on-Hudson Metro-North Railroad station is located in Irvington, New York and serves both the Ardsley area of Irvington and the neighboring village of Dobbs Ferry via the Hudson Line. Trains leave hourly for New York City 7 days a week, and every 25 to 35 minutes on weekday mornings during peak times. It is 21.0 miles from Grand Central Terminal and travel time to Grand Central is about 47 minutes.
